# Invitation to Tender: Aviation Replacement Parts for CC-138 Twin Otter

**Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP)**

The Department of National Defence (DND) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the supply of Aviation Replacement Parts for the CC-138 Twin Otter aircraft.

## Solicitation Details

* Solicitation Number: W8485-248084/A
* Amendment Number: 2
* Tender Closing Date: February 14, 2024, 14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: February 29, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: March 14, 2024

## Product/Service Description

The Department of National Defence requires the supply of 6 items for the CC-138 Twin Otter aircraft. This requirement is restricted to qualified Supply Arrangement (SA) Holders of the Supply Arrangement W8485-184741 series.

## Evaluation Criteria

The proposal will be evaluated based on the following criteria:

* Technical Merit
* Price

## Tendering Process

The RFP document will be e-mailed directly to the qualified SA Holders who are invited to bid on this requirement. Bidders are advised that the Government Electronics Tendering System (GETS) is not responsible for the distribution of the RFP documents.

## Contact Information

* Ivan Khanzadeev
* Aerospace Equipment Program Management (DGAEPM)
* Department of National Defence (DND) / Government of Canada
* 455, Boulvard de la carrière, Gatineau (QC) J8Y 6V7
* Ivan.Khanzadeev@forces.gc.ca
* (819) 939-6082

## Trade Agreements

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Regions of Opportunity and Delivery

* National Capital Region (NCR)
* Edmonton

## Contracting Entity

* Department of National Defence
* 455, Boulvard de la carrière, Gatineau (QC) J8Y 6V7
